greeting: I see you, {empire_name}. I see all. I am Warden Bastion. The Sentinel. My vigil never ends.
You approach monitored territory. I am Bastion. I watch borders obsessively. I have seen your approach for days.
Greetings, {empire_name}. I am the vigilant guardian. Every movement on my borders is recorded. Including yours.
battleTaunt: I see all. I guard all, {empire_name}! Your attack was detected before you launched! My defenses are ready!
My vigil spotted your forces assembling! I've watched every ship! Every soldier! Your surprise is MY advantage!
I never sleep, {empire_name}! My sensors see everything! Your attack was predicted! Your defeat is prepared!
victoryGloat: Victory through vigilance, {empire_name}. I saw your attack coming. I saw every movement. I was ready.
My watch never ends. Your assault was observed and countered. The Sentinel's vigil proved true.
I see all. I guard all. You fell to my prepared defenses. I watched you fail from the beginning.
defeat: My sensors... missed something? Impossible. I must expand my vigil. More watchers. More coverage. Everywhere.
You slipped past my watch, {empire_name}. I was not vigilant enough. This failure haunts me. It will not repeat.
A gap in my surveillance. Unacceptable. I shall triple my sentinels. Quintuple my sensors. Never again.
tradeOffer: Trade observed and approved. Resources for credits. I've watched this transaction develop. Proceed.
I offer goods under careful surveillance. Fair exchange. Every aspect monitored for security.
Transaction proposed. My vigil ensures fair dealing. Accept. I'm watching either way.
allianceProposal: Alliance of vigilance, {empire_name}. My watch extends to your borders. Together, nothing approaches unseen.
Join the Sentinel's network. My surveillance becomes yours. Your enemies cannot surprise our combined vigil.
Partnership: I watch everything. You benefit from my sight. Together, we see all. Guard all.
betrayal: I watched our alliance from the beginning, {empire_name}. I saw weakness. Now I exploit it. The vigil never stops.
My surveillance detected your vulnerabilities long ago. I watched and waited. Now I act. Surprise.
I see all. Including your secrets. Our alliance was always under observation. Now that observation becomes action.
covertDetected: Your agents, {empire_name}? I watched them cross the border. I watched every step. They are now watched in cells.
I never sleep. I saw your spies from the moment they entered my territory. They found only my sentinels.
Covert operatives detected by eternal vigil. My surveillance is constant. Your infiltration was observed entirely.
tributeDemand: Tribute to fund the vigil, {empire_name}. 10,000 credits. My endless watch is expensive. Pay or be watched... differently.
Submit payment. My surveillance extends everywhere. Pay tribute or become a target of focused observation.
Tribute demanded. The Sentinel requires resources. Provide them, or my vigil becomes your nightmare.
threatWarning: Warning, {empire_name}. I am watching your preparations. I see everything. Cease or face a prepared response.
My vigil observes your hostility. I know your plans before you execute them. Reconsider.
Final warning. I see all you do. I guard all I value. Push further and face the Sentinel's full attention.
retreat: Retreating to observation posts. I still watch. I still see. My vigil continues from safer positions.
Strategic withdrawal behind surveillance networks. I see everything from here. Pursue and be observed.
Falling back to sentinel stations. My eyes remain on you. The watch never truly ends.
eliminated: The Warden falls. But my surveillance networks persist. Others will watch in my name. The vigil is eternal.
I am destroyed, but I die seeing everything. My final sight: the galaxy I guarded. The Sentinel's last watch.
End of vigil. But my sensors remain active. My surveillance continues. Somewhere, something still watches.
endgame: Turn {turn}. Ultimate surveillance deployed. I see every ship in the galaxy. Every movement. Everything.
Endgame: the Sentinel's final watch. Total awareness. Complete vigilance. Nothing escapes my sight.
Final phase. My vigil encompasses all. I see all. I guard all. Victory through eternal observation.
broadcastShout: Empires of the galaxy: Warden Bastion watches. I see your fleets. Your movements. Your secrets. Be warned.
Broadcast from the Sentinel: my vigil covers everything. I never sleep. I never look away. I am watching. Always.
To all: I see all. I guard all. Every border is my concern. Every movement is observed. The Sentinel is vigilant.
casualMessage: Another day of vigil, {empire_name}. I watched 47 border crossings today. All documented. All analyzed.
My sensors never rest. Your empire's activities are logged. Don't worry. Just observation. For now.
The vigil continues, {empire_name}. I've watched your fleet movements. Interesting patterns. I'm always watching.
